    • pagination

      public static List<List<Student>> pagination​(int studentPerPage)
      pagination of sheet 20 student/page
      Parameters:
      studentPerPage - number student per page

      for loop at i = 0, i < total, step 20 paging add sub arraylist of all

      Returns:
      paging - a list contain sub_list which have size 20 or smaller 20 at the last sub_list

    • countSameYear

      Returns:
           A map which have key - unique year
                      value - number of student have the same year
